name: manage-engine-key-manager-plus
label: ManageEngine Key Manager Plus
description: Manage Engine Key Manager Plus connector provides key management solution that helps you consolidate, control, manage, monitor, and audit the entire life cycle of SSH (Secure Shell) keys and SSL (Secure Sockets Layer) certificates.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server_url
fields.description: URL of the Manage Engine Key Manager Plus server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.tooltip: URL of the Manage Engine Key Manager Plus server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: API Key
fields.name: token
fields.description: API key that is configured for your account to access the Manage Engine Key Manager Plus endpoint.
fields.tooltip: API key that is configured for your account to access the Manage Engine Key Manager Plus endpoint.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.
fields.tooltip: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Get SSH Keys
operations.description: Retrieves all SSH Keys across your network and import them into Key Manager Plus repository.

operations.title: Get SSL Certificates
operations.description: Retrieves all SSL certificates across your network and import them into Key Manager Plus repository.

parameters.title: Get SSL
parameters.name: search_type
parameters.tooltip: Select one of the method to get SSL certificates across your network and import them into Key Manager Plus repository.
parameters.description: Select one of the method to get SSL certificates across your network and import them into Key Manager Plus repository. You can choose between Hostname/IP Address or IP Address Range.

Hostname/IP Address.title: Hostname/IP Address
Hostname/IP Address.name: host
Hostname/IP Address.description: The Hostname or IP Address of the host to scan for SSL certificates.
Hostname/IP Address.tooltip: The Hostname or IP Address of the host to scan for SSL certificates.

IP Address Range.title: Start IP Address
IP Address Range.name: start_ip
IP Address Range.tooltip: The Starting IP address from which SSL certificates will be discovered from.
IP Address Range.description: The Starting IP address from which SSL certificates will be discovered from.

IP Address Range.title: End IP Address
IP Address Range.name: end_ip
IP Address Range.tooltip: The Ending IP address upto which SSL certificates will be discovered from.
IP Address Range.description: The Ending IP address upto which SSL certificates will be discovered from.

parameters.title: Time Out
parameters.name: time_out
parameters.tooltip: Time interval in seconds per resource after which the search automatically ceases.
parameters.description: Time interval in seconds per resource after which the search automatically ceases.

parameters.title: Port Number
parameters.name: port
parameters.tooltip: The Port Number to scan for SSL certificates.
parameters.description: The Port Number to scan for SSL certificates.

operations.title: Update Credentials
operations.description: Updates credentials of a discovered resource in Key Manager Plus based on the input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Resource Name
parameters.name: resource_name
parameters.tooltip: Hostname or IP Address of the discovered resource for which you want to apply credentials.
parameters.description: Hostname or IP Address of the discovered resource for which you want to apply credentials.

parameters.title: User Name
parameters.name: user_name
parameters.tooltip: User Name of any user account in the specified resource to get key management privileges for that particular account. Credentials of root account gives key management privileges for all account on resource.
parameters.description: User Name of any user account in the specified resource to get key management privileges for that particular account. Credentials of root account gives key management privileges for all account on resource.

parameters.title: Password
parameters.name: password
parameters.tooltip: Password of the specified user account.
parameters.description: Password of the specified user account.

parameters.title: Is Admin
parameters.name: is_admin
parameters.description: Specifies whether the user account is a Root or Administrator account. By default, this option is set as False.
parameters.tooltip: Specifies whether the user account is a Root or Administrator account. By default, this option is set as False.
